wikipedia_page.main: Augustus Edmonds Tozer F.R.C.O., A.R.C.M. (13 January 1857 – ?? February 1910) was an English composer and organist.

response: * Augustus Edmonds Tozer (1857–1910), English composer and organist

link_mentions.page: Church of the Sacred Heart, Hove
response: There has been a long tradition of choral singing at the Sacred Heart. The choir archives contain scores for Mozart and Haydn Masses, printed around 1870.  One of the early Directors Of Music in the 1890s was the then well known composer Augustus Edmonds Tozer, compiler of the Complete Benediction Manual, Catholic Hymns (1886), Catholic Choralist (1889), Modern Music For Church Choirs (1889) and composer of the Mass of St Wilfred, the Mass of the Most Blessed Sacrament and several sacred pieces.
